channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Dragon (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Hello and Welcome to my Custom Dragon Concept It is not a Blue Dragon Member tho. So without any more Talking heres the Concept
_Passive Abilities_ **Dragons Spirit** Immune to Occupy **Dragons Riches** When you Die the Player that Killed you Get uses of Revealing Coins to the Amount of Coins you Had _Day Abilities_ **Find Meal** Choose a Player if that Player dies you get a use of Dragons Bite and Their Coins.Can only Have 1 Target at a Time. **Unchain** If the Prince Executes you Tonight you will Kill him Instead and Removes Everything they wrote in the Journal this Day/Night.3 Uses _Night Abilities_ **Dragons Bite** Kill all Players Visiting you Remove everything they wrote in they Journal this Night/Day to Immune to Dead this Night and Get theirs Coins.1 Use. Win Condition: Collect 12 Coins and Survive until the End Coins you Get from Each Role Type Support/Social-1 Coin Investigative/Offensive-2 Coins Killer-3 Coins Special-4 Coins Prince-5 Coins
Ability from Dragon Riches _Day Ability_ **Revealing Coins** Reveal Something About a Player at the Cost of Coins 2-Coin Reveal a Players Class Type 4-Coins Reveal a Players Faction 5-Coins Reveal a Players Role 7-Coins Reveal a Players Full Will and Role

item.description:
This role looks much better now . I suppose you can leave coins there.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dragon (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
The word coin(s) was said 16 times in this suggestion. I like it, but I don’t like how much dragons hog their treasure. gives a look of disapproval @Queen_Alfa, smh mom*

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dragon (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Insert_Cancer_Here
item.description:
This is a very weak role in my opinion, because is basically a werewolf with some buffs and nerfs. The coins are just plain confusing, cause you have to literally implement a new button fot every single class, so I suggest removing that aspect of the Dragon. If you use Unchain you’re basically done for if the Prince decides to execute you. To summarize: Dragon Riches is a little too much to add for 1 class that may never spawn, and Unchain should clean the Prince’s journal, which will probably give you some time.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dragon (Neutral Killing)

item.description:
Doesn’t matter, the point is that you know what it meant

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dragon (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Jakena
item.description:
Hello and Welcome to my Custom Dragon Concept
It is not a Blue Dragon Member tho.
So without any more Talking heres the Concept

Passive Abilities
Dragons Spirit
Immune to Occupy
Dragons Riches
When you Die the Player that Killed you Get uses of Revealing Coins to the Amount of Coins you Had
Day Abilities
Find Meal
Choose a Player if that Player dies you get a use of Dragons Bite and Their Coins.Can only Have 1 Target at a Time.
Unchain
If the Prince Executes you Tonight you will Kill him Instead and Removes Everything they wrote in the Journal this Day/Night.3 Uses
Night Abilities
Dragons Bite
Kill all Players Visiting you Remove everything they wrote in they Journal this Night/Day to Immune to Dead this Night and Get theirs Coins.1 Use.
Win Condition: Collect 12 Coins and Survive until the End
Coins you Get from Each Role Type
Support/Social-1 Coin
Investigative/Offensive-2 Coins
Killer-3 Coins
Special-4 Coins
Prince-5 Coins

Ability from Dragon Riches
Day Ability
Revealing Coins
Reveal Something About a Player at the Cost of Coins
2-Coin Reveal a Players Class Type
4-Coins Reveal a Players Faction
5-Coins Reveal a Players Role
7-Coins Reveal a Players Full Will and Role
